page-developers-about: Bayanai akan waɗannan bukatun mai ƙirƙiran
page-developers-about-desc: ethereum.org na nan don taimaka muku wajen gini da Ethereum da kuma rubutattun tsarin abubuwan tushe da kuma abubuwan tari na cigaba. Bugu da ƙari akwai koyarwa da zai ɗaura ku a hanya da wuri.
page-developers-about-desc-2: Ilhamar ya samu ne daga haɗakar kungiyar Mozilla, mun dauka Ethereum na da bukatar guri ne da zai kunshi abubuwar masu ƙirƙira da kuma abubuwan bukatu masu girma ne. Kamar abokan mu a Mozilla, komai a nan a buɗe suke kuma a shirye suka don ka faɗaɗa da kuma inganta su.
page-developers-account-desc: Kwangiloli ko ko mutanen da suke kan hanyar sadarwan
page-developers-api-desc: Ana amfani da labirari don yin hulɗa tare da smart contracts
page-developers-block-desc: Ajujuwan kasuwancin da aka ɗauka zuwa shi Blockchain
page-developers-block-explorers-desc: Hanyar shafin ka na bayanan Ethereum
page-developers-dev-env-desc: IDEs na taimakawa wajen haɓaka dapp
page-developers-evm-desc: Kwamfuta da ke sarrafa hada-hadan kasuwanci
page-developers-feedback: Idan kana da wani tsokaci, ka tuntuɓe mu ta GitHub ko ta Discord.
page-developers-frameworks-desc: Kayan aikin da suke taimakawa wajen ƙirƙira ci gabar sauri
page-developers-gas-desc: Ana ɓuƙatar Ether don ƙarfafa cinikayya
page-developers-get-started: Ta ya kuke so a fara?
page-developers-improve-ethereum: Taimaka mana wajen saka ethereum.org ya fi haka
page-developers-improve-ethereum-desc: Kamar dai ethereum.org, waɗannan dokin ƙoƙarin al'umma ne. Ka ƙirƙiri PR idan ka ga kuskure, wuri domin gyara, ko kuma sababbin zarafi don taimaka wa masu ƙera Ethereum.
page-developers-intro-ether-desc: Gabatarwa zuwa kuɗin kiripto da Erher
page-developers-intro-dapps-desc: Gabatarwa zuwa manhajoji masu cin gashin kansu
page-developers-js-libraries-desc: Amfani da JavaScript wurin alaƙa da smart contract
page-developers-language-desc: Ana amfani da Ethereum tare da sanannun harsuna
page-developers-learn-desc: Karanta mahimman ra'ayoyi da adana Ethereum a cikin takaddun mu.
page-developers-learn-tutorials-desc: Koyi haɓaka Ethereum daki-daki daga maginan dauka riga suka gina.
page-developers-meta-desc: Takardu, koyarwa, da kayan aiki domin masu ƙirƙira su gina akan Ethereum.
page-developers-mining-desc: Yadda aka ƙirƙiri sabbin blocks da kuma cimma yarjejeniya ta amfani da tabbacin-aiki
page-developers-mining-algorithms-desc: Bayanai akan hanyoyin saukaka haƙar ma'adanan Ethereum
page-developers-networks-desc: Bayanai kan Mainnet da hanyoyin sadarwa na gwaji
page-developers-node-clients-desc: Yadda ake tantance blocks da cinikayya akan hanyoyin sadarwa
page-developers-oracle-desc: Samun bayanan da ba a kan chain ba cikin smart contracts ɗinka
page-developers-smart-contract-security-: La'akari da matakan tsaro a wurin ƙirƙirar smart contracts
page-developers-setup-desc: Ka shirya jerinka domin ginawa ta wajen shirya yanayi na ci gaba.
page-developers-smart-contracts-desc: Hikimar da ke bayan dapps - yarjejeniya masu gabatar da kansu
page-developers-speedrunethereum-title: Koyi duka bayanai masu amfani wurin gini akan Ethereum
page-developers-start-desc: Kana son jarabawa a fari, sa'anan ayi tambayoyi daga baya?
page-developers-subtitle: Bayanan maginan Ethereum. Na magina, don magina.
page-developers-token-standards-desc: Bayanai kan ma'aunin alamar cinikayya da aka amince
page-developers-web3-desc: Yadda ingancin duniyar web3 take daban
page-developers-networking-layer-desc: Gabatarwa zuwa layer na hanyoyin sadarwar Ethereum
page-developers-data-structures-and-enco: Gabatarwa zuwa tsarin bayanai da kuma shigar da su a adanawar Ethereum
alt-eth-blocks: Nuna jerin block kamar logo ɗin ETH
